name: Little Die’s Dicey Adventure
description:
A small platformer where you roll Dice to improve Little Die's abilities. WIP.

The easiest way to see the core mechanic that we wanted for this game. Roll the dice and try to get it to roll a 4 on the D6 (Standard die) then use the created D10 to roll and modify your jump height.

Note: 

  • The dice can have problems if it falls off the world or gets stuck. You can reset by using "R" or you can fall off the world. If all else fails go back to the hub to fix the dice. Thank you and apologies in advance.  :)
  • The audio for sound effects was made by use, however, the music is cited below.

Controls

  • Movement - WASD or left control stick
  • Jump - Space bar or bottom face button
  • Dive - Left Control or Right Trigger
  • Sprint - Left Shift or Left Trigger
  • Pause - ESC, M, or Right Special Button
  • E - Roll of the Dice 
  • R - Reset
